name: Treasure Season
description:
A magical seed created an entire dungeon full of treasures, it’s your job to collect as many as possible before the thieves come! And to do that, you’ll only have your guts and basically anything you can find inside that dungeon, but everything is hidden underground! You’ll have to harvest these objects and hey! Maybe that way you’ll find some unique treasures!

Use the items you find buried underground as weapons, don’t be afraid to throw them, after all, they are all magical so they can take your enemies with a smack!

Controls:

Arrows: Move Left and right

Space: Jump

Z: Throw an object.

C: Pull a buried object.

X: Pick up the object

The game was made for the Ludum Dare 52 in the category of "JAM". I'll detail more of the development in a post-mortem (dev-log) later.
